title: Goat's cheese and pear starter salad
ingredients: ['For the salad', '1 (140g) packet rocket leaves', '3 large conference pears, cored and thinly sliced', "450g goat's cheese", '220g dried cranberries', '220g toasted walnuts', 'For the dressing', '2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons honey', '3 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '7 tablespoons vegetable oil', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
